articles.description: WINSTON — Wildlife Safari raised over $174,000 at its Annual Benefit Dinner and Auction on Sept. 8. The highlight of the evening was a shared commitment to the conservation of rhinos and the expansion of Rhino Boma.
articles.title: Wildlife Safari raises over $174,000 for Rhino Boma expansion

articles.author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
articles.description: Con-Vey was awarded a Top Workplaces 2023 honor by The Oregonian Top Workplaces, according to a press release issues Tuesday.
articles.title: The Oregonian names Con-Vey a top place to work

articles.author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
articles.description: Job growth is rebounding post-pandemic in nearly every Oregon county, but the portion of households in financial hardship remains stuck statewide at 44%, according to the most recent Oregon by the Numbers 2023 data released by the Ford Family Foundation.
articles.title: Too wealthy for help, not wealthy enough for needs

articles.author: GLORIA COLEMAN The News-Review
articles.description: Rain and sunshine battled in the sky as over 120 companies and corporations welcomed high school seniors and juniors from over 50 different schools, and later veterans and active military families, to the Seven Feathers Convention Center and parking lot.
articles.title: Kids explore career choices at SOTCE

articles.author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
articles.description: U.S. Senators Ron Wyden and Jeff Merkley announced four rural Oregon fire departments will receive a combined nearly $2.2 million from FEMA for firefighter recruitment and retention on Sept. 20.
articles.title: Drain and Tenmile fire departments receive combined $1.1 million in funding

articles.author: ERICA REYNOLDS The News-Review
articles.description: ROSEBURG — The Riversdale Grange, located at 4856 Garden Valley Road, Roseburg, will host Community Appreciation Day beginning at 3 p.m. Sunday, Oct. 15.
articles.title: Grange to host Community Appreciation Day

articles.author: ERICA REYNOLDS The News-Review
articles.description: OAKLAND — A Sip & Savor fundraiser will be held 1-5p.m. Oct. 21 at the Secret Wine Society, 110 SE First St., Oakland.
articles.title: Mildred Kanipe Meorial Park Fundraiser scheduled for Oct. 21

articles.title: Umpqua National Forest Seeks Resource Advisory Committee Members
